metadata.title: CVE-2021-32719 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description: RabbitMQ is a multi-protocol messaging broker. In rabbitmq-server prior toversion 3.8.18, when a federation link was displayed in the RabbitMQmanagement UI via the `rabbitmq_federation_management` plugin, its consumertag was rendered without proper <script> tag sanitization. This potentiallyallows for JavaScript code execution in the context of the page. The usermust be signed in and have elevated permissions (manage federationupstreams and policies) for this to occur. The vulnerability is patched inRabbitMQ 3.8.18. As a workaround, disable the`rabbitmq_federation_management` plugin and use [CLItools](https://www.rabbitmq.com/cli.html) instead.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
